CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 1, 1969, p. 3, reads: "$500 For NAACP - Edward V. Randall Jr., (left) senior vice-president, Pittsburgh National Bank, presents a $500 check to Charles Hoston, NAACP Building Fund Chairman, as Richard Barber (center), chairman, Business and Industry Committee of the Campaign, smiles his approval.  The donation is for the NAACP's drive to raise $65,000 to renovate its headquarters building at 2201-3 Wylie Ave. HARRIS PHOTO."
TitMainTitle: Senior vice president of Pittsburgh National Bank Edward V. Randall Jr. handing check to Charles Hoston on behalf of NAACP, with Richard Barber standing in center
